name: Ceramic Shooter: Electronic Poem
description:
Ceramic Shooter: Electronic Poem is the sequel to Ceramic Shooter. As in the original, you pilot a ship with a malfunctioning cannon, and the goal (for the majority of the game) is to not shoot anything. Unlike the original, the game consists of one continuous level. Also, the entire game is synchronized to the background music.

This game was featured on TIGSource in 2010.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move ship
Esc: Go to title screen; quit game at title screen
ENTER: Start the game at title screen; advance cutscenes
